ygData.subject: Kedge Loot
ygData.msgSnippet: If you killed CauldronBoil the shark, one of his drops is the Sharkjaw Cutlass (10/32 weight 2.0).  It s a very nice weapon with a great curved and serrated
ygData.messageBody:
If you killed CauldronBoil the shark, one of his drops is the Sharkjaw
Cutlass (10/32 weight 2.0). It's a very nice weapon with a great curved and
serrated look to it that I won a roll for. I get inspected *a lot* wielding
this weapon, and I get tells from out of the blue from people saying
"soandso told me you have a sharkjaw, what're the stats?" When people ask I
tell them "10/32 weight 2.0, procs Player Inspections".

Crier

> Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 35 Songs - Veeshan
>
> Ps, been residing in Kedge the last few days, exp is great there and it's
> good fun. Anyone know what kind of good stuff drops there? Our group have
> been as low as the 2nd level and it's damn scary. We killed a Cauldron
> shark and then a Hammerhead shark spawned in it's place, it was
> red a level 38 so I am wondering if it's a named mob that drops something
good.
